description: This skill gives Alexa the ability to find out the latest video game deals online and tells you what there are, what store they are in, their percentage off, how their final price. Great skill for frugal gamers! This skill is not affiliated with, but uses data from https://www.isthereanydeal.com
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Game Deals for recent deals
Alexa, ask Game Deals for ten recent deals
Alexa, ask Game Deals todays deals
name: Game Deals
shortDescription: Ask Alexa for the latest game deals, and she will tell you what, where and for how much recent game deals are.
